LittleDog::TerrainInfo Struct Reference

#include <littledog.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Motion capture information on a per terrain board basis.

Description:
Each terrain board that is tracked has an ID tag, position, orientation and an associated age variable that indicates how many frames 'old' the data is.


Public Attributes

bduVec3f m_position
 3d position in global coordinates, in meters
bduVec3f m_orientation
 3d position in global coordinates, in yaw-roll-pitch Euler angles
int m_age
 number of frames this data is out of date
